ai-tha-ap369:0.3_0: Hearing this sal tree trunk, the senior in charge of senior monks.
ai-tha-ap369:2.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
ai-tha-ap369:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap369:3.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap369:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Udumbara.
ai-tha-ap369:5.1_0: and the seventh simile was full of flowers.
